content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an error message when attempting to execute the Python code "sudo apt-get install iputils-ping && ping -c 5 google.com". I then executed the shell command "sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y iputils-ping && ping -c 5 google.com" and searched for running routes at Brno Reservoir on the website greatruns.com. I then executed the Python code "import os\nos.system('sudo apt-get install iputils-ping')\nos.system('ping -c 5 google.com')" and received confirmation that the package was installed and internet connection is working.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "question": "What are the best running routes around the Brno Reservoir?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information on running routes around the Brno Reservoir in Czechia. While there isn't a loop trail around the entire reservoir, there are some sections of waterfront path or roadside sidewalk. The article maps out 8 km of the most suitable running in the reservoir area, which includes rolling hills. Additionally, there are a couple of decent options for running near the 13th-century Veveří Castle, located a few km west of the reservoir. The article also provides information on bus access and other running routes in the area.\n\nLinks: ['About (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'About Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'Great Runs Team (https://greatruns.com/great-runs-team/)', 'Working With Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/working-with-great-runs/)', 'GR in the Media (https://greatruns.com/as-seen-in/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
